Package pamViewFX.fxPlotPanes

Class PlotPane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane
pamViewFX.fxNodes.PamBorderPane
pamViewFX.fxPlotPanes.PlotPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
Direct Known Subclasses:
DDPlotPane, DLTransformImage.TransformPlotPane
public class PlotPane extends PamBorderPane
The plot pane contains 4 axis. A top and bottom x axis and a top and bottom y axis. It also contains a canvas to plot on.
Author:
Jamie Macaulay

  • Method Details

    • setHidePane

      public void setHidePane(javafx.scene.layout.Pane pane, javafx.scene.Node icon, javafx.geometry.Side side)
      Set a hiding pane within the plot area
      Parameters:
      pane - - the pane whihc is hidden
      icon - - the icon for the button to show on the plot to open the pane
      side - - the location of the pna eon the plot (left or right)

    • getHidePane

      public HidingPane getHidePane(javafx.geometry.Side side)
      Get one of the hiding panes within the plot area
      Parameters:
      side - - the location of the pna eon the plot (left or right)
      Returns:
      a hiding pane.

    • getPlotCanvas

      public javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas getPlotCanvas()

      Returns:
      the plot canvas.

    • getAxis

      public PamAxisFX getAxis(javafx.geometry.Side side)
      Get an axis of the plot pane.
      Parameters:
      side - the axis to get.
      Returns:
      the PamAxisFX corresponding to the side.

    • getAxisPane

      public PamAxisPane2 getAxisPane(javafx.geometry.Side side)
      Get an axis pane. The axis pane is the node which displays a PamAxisFX.
      Parameters:
      side - the axis pane to get.
      Returns:
      the AxisPane corresponding to the side.

    • getAllAxis

      public PamAxisFX[] getAllAxis()
      Get all the axis of the plot pane.
      Returns:
      a list of axis in the order: TOP, RIGHT, BOTTOM, LEFT.

    • getAllAxisPanes

      public PamAxisPane2[] getAllAxisPanes()
      Get an axis pane
      Parameters:
      side - the axis to get.

    • setEmptyBorders

      public void setEmptyBorders(double top, double right, double bottom, double left)

    • setAxisVisible

      public void setAxisVisible(boolean top, boolean right, boolean bottom, boolean left)
      Set which axis are visible.
      Parameters:
      top - true to show the top axis
      right - true to show the right axis
      bottom - true to show the bottom axis
      left - true to show the left axis

    • setMinHidePaneHeight

      public void setMinHidePaneHeight(double minHeight)
      Set the minimium height of the right and left hide pane. Set -1 for there to be no minimum height. If the hide pane goes below the minimum height it pops out of its holder.
      Parameters:
      minHeight - . the mnimimum height of the hide pane in pixels
